short_summary: Request for Information regarding the Electronic Traveller Health Information (eTHI) project
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: All responses must be submitted by July 14, 2023 at 14:00 EDT. The purpose of this RFI is to solicit feedback from Industry about the Electronic Traveller Health Information (eTHI) project.
full_summary:
# Electronic Traveller Health Information (eTHI) Project Request for Information (RFI)

## Project Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Health (HC) is soliciting feedback from industry on the Electronic Traveller Health Information (eTHI) project. The eTHI project aims to develop a digital platform for health information exchange between travelers and healthcare providers.

## Tender Details
* **Reference Number:** WS4056891315-Doc4057001742
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4056891315
* **Publication Date:** June 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 14, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** TBA
* **Expected Contract End Date:** TBA
* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)

## Contracting Entity and End User
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Department of Health (HC)

## Notice
Please note that the original closing time for the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline has been amended. All required supporting documentation and responses must be submitted by July 14, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST.

## Trade Agreements
This RFI is open to contractors who are eligible under the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

## Regions of Operation and Delivery
The contract will be executed within the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Contact Information
* **Contact Name:** Ian Dooley
* **Contact Email:** [ian.dooley@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ian.dooley@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16597742?extsite=MTY1OTc3NDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

I rewrote the provided text to meet your requirements in a professional manner. I reformatted the content to provide clear headings, concise information, and respectful language. Additionally, I reformatted the trade agreements section for clarity and added relevant links
